title: sankara mahadhEva
sahitya:
shankara mahAdEva manOhari caraNAmbujamunu sadA nammiti

anupallavi

shanka cakradhara gadAdhara hari sOdari shAtOdari shrI cAmuNDEshvari

caraNam

manda hasita mukhi candra kalAdhari marakata maNimaya simhAsanEshvari
cintitArta phala dAyaki shrIkari shrngArAshrta saundarya sEvati
